mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, picture = #{picture} where email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL ,NAME ,PHONE ,PICTURE FROM MEMBER MEM JOIN JOININFO ON MEM.EMAIL = JOININFO.MEMBER_EMAIL WHERE JOININFO.CHANNEL_ID = #{channel_id} ORDER BY MEM.NAME
SELECT EMAIL ,NAME ,PHONE ,PICTURE FROM MEMBER MEM WHERE EMAIL = (SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL FROM SNS_INFO WHERE IDENTIFIER = #{id})
SELECT EMAIL ,PASSWORD ,NAME ,PHONE ,PICTURE FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT * FROM MEMBER MEM INNER JOIN AUTHORITIES AUTH ON AUTH.MEMBER_EMAIL = MEM.EMAIL AND AUTH.ROLES_AUTHORITY != 'ROLE_ROOT'
SELECT EMAIL ,NAME ,PHONE ,PICTURE FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL NOT IN (SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL FROM JOININFO WHERE CHANNEL_ID = #{channel_id}) AND EMAIL != 'root'
